docs.snippet: Malaysia said on Friday the hunt for missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 will end in two weeks after the search is completed of a 120,000 square kilometer (9,650 sq mile) area where experts thought it went down....
docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia said on Friday the hunt for missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 will end in two weeks after the search is completed of a 120,000 square kilometer (9,650 sq mile) area where experts thought it went down.

headline.main: Malaysia Says Search for Missing MH370 to End in Two Weeks
headline.print_headline: Malaysia Says Search for Missing MH370 to End in Two Weeks

docs.snippet: U.S. and UK equity indexes holding near record highs, a brighter earnings outlook and rising forecasts for economic growth have all spurred talk of the "January effect," or the notion that the first month of the year is always bullish for stocks....

headline.main: The 'January Effect' for Stock Markets Is Fading: Goldman

docs.snippet: Gunfire erupted at a military camp in the western Ivory Coast town of Daloa on Friday, a resident and a military source said, hours after demobilised soldiers seized control of Bouake, the West African nation's second largest city....

docs.snippet: Economic sentiment in the euro zone surged to a post-crisis record in December and German industrial orders pointed to a busy final quarter for factories in Europe's powerhouse with the government expecting the upswing to carry into 2017....
docs.lead_paragraph: Economic sentiment in the euro zone surged to a post-crisis record in December and German industrial orders pointed to a busy final quarter for factories in Europe's powerhouse with the government expecting the upswing to carry into 2017.

headline.main: Euro Zone Economy Starts Year in Chipper Mood, Germany Outlook Bright
headline.print_headline: Euro Zone Economy Starts Year in Chipper Mood, Germany Outlook Bright
